list.description:
Hi everyone, i've decided to make this new sight based on our beloved War Thunder Logo!
Hope you enjoy it!

There are 5 variants:
- Small centered sight
- Small offcentered sight
- Centered sight
- Offcentered sight
- a WAY TOO BIG sight, just for the fun

#warthunder #sight #logo
#hiiragi_utena #anime #magicalgirls #gushingovermagicalgirls #utena #hiiragi

Miho from Girls und Panzer.

Me honestly when my engine turns slowly turns redder and redder after my oil starts leaking.

Requested by @Kubster6458 here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1136719/en/?comment=4173014
Reference image: https://www.reddit.com/r/GirlsUndShitposts/comments/1j9gih1/give_me_your_gup_reaction_images/#lightbox

Contains 2 sizes, as well as the 2 .JSON files for editing.

#miho #mihonishizumi #nishizumi #oorai #oarai #gup #girls_und_panzer #anime
#sakuya #sakuya_izayoi #touhou #anime #mbtsight #samsight #aimbot #heart

Original art made by "meowmegu"

Sight comes in big/small sizes

I had this sight already done a long time ago but was not really proud of my detailing, but still think it's really cute so here it is. If you find out any problems with it let me know and I'll do my best to fix it ASAP/

Have a good time!

Omaneko (おまねこ) [the mascot of the Japanese Air Self Defense Force (JASDF) Omezaki base]

♦Accepting orders, ping me on our archive server or write me in dm discord: reforder

♦Also check my other works

#sight #alltanks

#undertale #toriel #wtdraw
it's time for the first one to be toriel.

How to Download
1:Extract the file first.
2:Move "aizen1 and aizen2" to UserSights folder and paste into all_tanks and tank_sight_presets
WarThunder > UserSights > tank_sight_presets
WarThunder > UserSights > all_tanks
3:open the game and use
